title: T206 Matty Dark Cap Tolstoi SGC 20  FT
author: soxinseven

posts.post_title: T206 Matty Dark Cap Tolstoi SGC 20  FT
posts.post_content:
I have an SGC 20 Tolstoi Matty for trade. Card presents well but has a spot of paper loss on the back. A scan of the card can be seen in my signature link at the bottom of this post. I do not have a back scan but will get one shortly. In trade I am looking for rare backed T206's of Frank Arellanes or any Joe Wood items I do not currently have.
                                                    Thanks,
                                                      Steve
Just wanted to add that I already have the Cycle 350 and Tolstoi backs of Arellanes.....

Hey Steve,

If you are ever looking to sell the card, please let me know.

Thanks - Rob
One bump before I put it away and dig something else out to trade.....

Steve, 

I have this card available.  Email me at [url]b.brownbaseball@verizon.net[/url]  Thanks, Bill
